column4: ok - but I guess that if you tell my that synaptic is better than it's Kubuntu's counterpart, I may be best to consider Ubuntu than Kubuntu, altough this involves changing from KDE to Gnome?
hymn: it's now become hard to choose... :-)
don't forget I am quite new to the Linux world - would having both desktops be a complicated thing to set-up?
i am very new as well and it isnt very hard :D
